author: Simon Difford
description: Rosewater, honey, chocolate and vanilla provide a distinct flavour of Turkish Delight - fortified with vodka.
name: Turkish Delight Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR honey and vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
